lead_paragraph: Secretary of Defense Robert M. Gates said a Taliban announcement that they were going through the classified documents “basically proves the point” that the disclosures put lives at risk.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

headline.main: Gates Cites Peril in Leak of Afghan War Logs by WikiLeaks
